text: Ara tomadera strira ya rekhe yaya tara ardheka tomadera jan'ya yadi tadera kono chelepile na thake, kintu yadi tadera santana thake tabe tomadera jan'ya tara ya rekhe geche tara eka-caturthansa, -- kono ochiyatnamaya tara u'ila kare thakale ba dena thakale ta adayera pare. Ara tadera jan'ya ya tomara rekhe ya'o tara eka-caturthansa yadi tomadera kono santana na thake, kintu yadi tomadera chelepile thake tabe tadera jan'ya ya tomara rekhe gecha tara ata bhagera ekabhaga, -- kono ochiyatnamaya tomara u'ila kare thakale ba dena thakale ta adayera pare. Ara yadi kono purusa ba strilokake nihsantana-bhabe uttaradhikara karate haya o tara eka bha'i ba eka bona thake tabe tadera ubhayera pratyekera jan'ya chaya bhagera eka bhaga, kintu yadi tara era ceye besi haya tabe tara habe eka trtiyansera ansidara, -- kono ochiyatnamaya tara u'ila kare thakale ba dena thakale ta adayera pare, -- kono ksati na kare, e hacche allahâ€Œra tarapha theke bidhana. Ara allah hacchena sarbajnata, ati amayika.
